title: Dru Hill Interview and More
itunes:title: Dru Hill Interview and More
description:
Today on the show we had the new Dru Hill stop in for Throwback Thursday's where they spoke about the break up of Dru Hill, new music and more. Also, Charlamgane gave "Donkey of the Day" to Linda Fairfield for trying to sue Ava Duvernay for her portrayal in "When They See Us" and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
